verses.verse: אַף־ <WH637> also לְ֭זֹאת <WH2063> At this יֶחֱרַ֣ד <WH2729> trembleth לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> also my heart וְ֝יִתַּ֗ר <WH5425> and is moved out מִמְּקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> of his place

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> attentively בְּרֹ֣גֶז <WH7267> the noise קֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> of his voice וְ֝הֶ֗גֶה <WH1899> and the sound מִפִּ֥יו <WH6310> of his mouth יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> [that] goeth out תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> Thahash כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner
הַשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> under the whole heaven יִשְׁרֵ֑הוּ <WH3474> He directeth וְ֝אוֹר֗וֹ <WH216> and his lightning עַל־ <WH5921> unto כַּנְפ֥וֹת <WH3671> unto the ends הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

אַחֲרָ֤יו ׀ <WH310> After יִשְׁאַג־ <WH7580> roareth ק֗וֹל <WH6963> it a voice יַ֭רְעֵם <WH7481> he thundereth בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> with the voice גְּאוֹנ֑וֹ <WH1347> of his excellency וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יְ֝עַקְּבֵ֗ם <WH6117> and he will not stay כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> is heard קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> them when his voice

יַרְעֵ֤ם <WH7481> thundereth אֵ֣ל <WH410> God בְּ֭קוֹלוֹ <WH6963> with his voice נִפְלָא֑וֹת <WH6381> marvellously עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> doeth גְ֝דֹל֗וֹת <WH1419> great things וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot נֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> he which we cannot comprehend

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For לַשֶּׁ֨לַג ׀ <WH7950> to the snow יֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> For he saith הֱוֵ֫א <WH1933> Be thou אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> [on] the earth וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <WH1653> rain מָטָ֑ר <WH4306> likewise to the small וְ֝גֶ֗שֶׁם <WH1653> rain מִטְר֥וֹת <WH4306> and to the great עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <WH5797> of his strength בְּיַד־ <WH3027> able כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner
אָדָ֥ם <WH120> of every man יַחְתּ֑וֹם <WH2856> He sealeth up לָ֝דַ֗עַת <WH3045> may know כָּל־ <WH3605> of every אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> men מַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <WH4639> his work
וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> go חַיָּ֣ה <WH2416> Then the beasts בְמוֹ־ <WH1119> into אָ֑רֶב <WH695> dens וּבִמְע֖וֹנֹתֶ֣יהָ <WH4585> in their places תִשְׁכֹּֽן׃ <WH7931> and remain
מִן־ <WH4480> Out הַ֭חֶדֶר <WH2315> Out of the south תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> cometh סוּפָ֑ה <WH5492> the whirlwind וּֽמִמְּזָרִ֥ים <WH4215> out of the north קָרָֽה׃ <WH7135> and cold

מִנִּשְׁמַת־ <WH5397> By the breath אֵ֥ל <WH410> of God יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> is given קָ֑רַח <WH7140> frost וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth מַ֣יִם <WH4325> of the waters בְּמוּצָֽק׃ <WH4164> is straitened
אַף־ <WH637> Also בְּ֭רִי <WH7377> Also by watering יַטְרִ֣יחַ <WH2959> he wearieth עָ֑ב <WH5645> the thick cloud יָ֝פִ֗יץ <WH6327> he scattereth עֲנַ֣ן <WH6051> cloud אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <WH216> his bright

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> It מְסִבּ֨וֹת ׀ <WH4524> round about מִתְהַפֵּ֣ךְ <WH2015> And it is turned [בְּתַחְבּוּלָתֹו כ] (בְּתַחְבּוּלֹתָ֣יו <WH8458> fornication ק) לְפָעֳלָ֑ם <WH6467> that they may do כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he יְצַוֵּ֓ם ׀ <WH6680> whatsoever he commandeth עַל־ <WH5921> On פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> them upon the face תֵבֵ֣ל <WH8398> of the world אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> in the earth

אִם־ <WH518> Whether לְשֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> whether for correction אִם־ <WH518> or לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> or for his land אִם־ <WH518> Or לְ֝חֶ֗סֶד <WH2617> or for mercy יַמְצִאֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4672> He causeth it to come

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> Hearken זֹּ֣את <WH2063> O אִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> unto this O Job עֲ֝מֹ֗ד <WH5975> stand still וְהִתְבּוֹנֵ֤ן ׀ <WH995> and consider נִפְלְא֬וֹת <WH6381> the wondrous אֵֽל׃ <WH410> works of God

הֲ֭תֵדַע <WH3045> Dost thou know בְּשׂוּם־ <WH7760> disposed אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> when God עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> unto וְ֝הוֹפִ֗יעַ <WH3313> to shine א֣וֹר <WH216> them and caused the light עֲנָנֽוֹ׃ <WH6051> of his cloud

הֲ֭תֵדַע <WH3045> Dost thou know עַל־ <WH5921> about מִפְלְשֵׂי־ <WH4657> the balancings עָ֑ב <WH5645> of the clouds מִ֝פְלְא֗וֹת <WH4652> the wondrous works תְּמִ֣ים <WH8549> of him which is perfect דֵּעִֽים׃ <WH1843> knowledge
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose בְּגָדֶ֥יךָ <WH899> How thy garments חַמִּ֑ים <WH2525> [are] warm בְּהַשְׁקִ֥ט <WH8252> when he quieteth אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> the earth מִדָּרֽוֹם׃ <WH1864> by the south

תַּרְקִ֣יעַ <WH7554> Hast thou with him spread out עִ֭מּוֹ <WH5973> out לִשְׁחָקִ֑ים <WH7834> the sky חֲ֝זָקִ֗ים <WH2389> [which is] strong כִּרְאִ֥י <WH7209> looking glass מוּצָֽק׃ <WH3332> [and] as a molten

ה֭וֹדִיעֵנוּ <WH3045> Teach מַה־ <WH4100> what נֹּ֣אמַר <WH559> us what we shall say ל֑וֹ לֹ֥א־ <WH3808> cannot נַ֝עֲרֹ֗ךְ <WH6186> unto him [for] we cannot order מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> [our speech] by reason חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> of darkness

הַֽיְסֻפַּר־ <WH5608> Shall it be told ל֭וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> him that I speak אִֽם־ <WH518> lo אָ֥מַר <WH559> speak אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> ? if a man כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְבֻלָּֽע׃ <WH1104> surely he shall be swallowed up

וְעַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH6258> Now לֹ֘א <WH3808> not רָ֤אוּ <WH7200> And now [men] see א֗וֹר <WH216> light בָּהִ֣יר <WH925> not the bright ה֭וּא <WH1931> which בַּשְּׁחָקִ֑ים <WH7834> which [is] in the clouds וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> but the wind עָ֝בְרָ֗ה <WH5674> passeth וַֽתְּטַהֲרֵֽם׃ <WH2891> and cleanseth
מִ֭צָּפוֹן <WH6828> out of the north זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> Fair weather יֶֽאֱתֶ֑ה <WH857> cometh עַל־ <WH5921> Around אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <WH433> with God נ֣וֹרָא <WH3372> [is] terrible הֽוֹד׃ <WH1935> majesty

שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> [Touching] the Almighty לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not מְ֭צָאנֻהוּ <WH4672> we cannot find him out שַׂגִּיא־ <WH7689> [he is] excellent כֹ֑חַ <WH3581> in power וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> and in judgment וְרֹב־ <WH7230> and in plenty צְ֝דָקָ֗ה <WH6666> of justice לֹ֣א <WH3808> and He will not יְעַנֶּֽה׃ <WH6031> he will not afflict

לָ֭כֵן <WH3651> Therefore יְרֵא֣וּהוּ <WH3372> do therefore fear אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> Men לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִ֝רְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> him he respecteth כָּל־ <WH3605> any חַכְמֵי־ <WH2450> not any [that are] wise לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of heart פ
